title: A Legend Advances
description:
Pablo Torre and Tony Kornheiser discuss their thoughts on Serena’s second round win in the US Open, if it is significant that Russel Wilson’s new 5-year extension with the Broncos is not fully guaranteed and how concerned the Yankees should be with a 6 game lead over the Rays. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Serena wins again in the second round of the US Open and Russell Wilson west a new 5-Year extension with the Broncos.
